attributes.action: make it legal to eat mince pies on cristmas day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Historic law dictactes it is illegal to eat one of our festive favourites on cristmas day. Please allow us to enjoy without feeling we are breaking the law.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
